body: Hey guys, OPTOBAT here, just a random AMA, because everyone seems to do them and I'm happy to answer just about any question about me or my YT channel. :)
body_tagged: Hey guys, OPTOBAT here, just a random AMA, because everyone seems to do them and I'm happy to answer just about any question about me or my YT channel. :)
title: OPTOBAT's AMA (Since Everyone's Doing it)

replies.body: How did you come up with your name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your name?

replies.body:
Well, believe it or not it's just a weird, boring story... 
About 14 months ago i had my return to Minecraft after leaving the game for about 2 years.
My old name in 2011 was SnoopyHawk!
But when i returned i had forgotten everything about it, like my password and what servers i played on etc.
So anyway, being a random, spastic kid 14 months ago i just put together an original 1 word name to use, that looked clean and sounded okay, so out of nowhere i just put together op-to-bat, to get OPTOBAT had here we are!
replies.body_tagged:
